Kristin Lucille Penta and Dr. Michael Louis Arvanitis were married yesterday by the Rev. Christ Kontos at St. George Greek Orthodox Church in Asbury Park, N.J.

Mrs. Arvanitis, 29, created and founded Fun Cosmetics, a makeup line for teenagers that was in Hillside, N.J. She is now a cosmetics consultant in Deal, N.J. She graduated from Clark University, and is the daughter of Rosemary I. Penta and Carmen M. Penta of West Long Branch, N.J.

Dr. Arvanitis, 45, is a colorectal surgeon in private practice in Shrewsbury, N.J. He is also the founder of the Patricia Burton High Risk Colorectal Cancer Center at Monmouth Medical Center in Long Branch, N.J. He graduated from Lafayette College and received his medical degree from Hahnemann Medical College. He is the son of Penelope K. Arvanitis and George N. Arvanitis of West Allenhurst, N.J.
